tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crime_data (
  crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id INT,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  crime_rate FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES heat_map_data(region_id)
);
CREATE TABLE heat_maps ( region_id INT, region_name VARCHAR(50), population_density INT, crime_rate FLOAT )
CREATE TABLE regions ( region_id INT, region_name VARCHAR(50), latitude DECIMAL(9,6), longitude DECIMAL(9,6) )
CREATE TABLE population_data ( population_id INT, region_id INT, year INT, population_count INT )
CREATE TABLE crime_data ( crime_id INT, region_id INT, year INT, crime_type VARCHAR(50), crime_count INT )

CREATE TABLE region_data (
    region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    population_density FLOAT NOT NULL,
    crime_rate FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE heat_map_data (
    map_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT REFERENCES region_data(region_id),
    map_image BYTEA NOT NULL,
    map_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE map_preferences (
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_data(user_id),
    map_id INT REFERENCES heat_map_data(map_id),
    display_mode VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE heatmap_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_id INT REFERENCES heat_map_data(map_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_data(user_id),
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
